name: Shanmugavel A
aboutMeHeadline: I'm Shanmugavel A, a Flutter Developer, Technical Trainer, and Cross-Platform Mobile App Developer.
aboutMeDetails: I'm a recent graduate with a degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering from Rajalakshmi Engineering College, Chennai. I have been actively involved in mobile app development, particularly with Flutter, and have completed several internships to hone my skills. My goal is to become a proficient software developer and contribute to innovative projects in the tech industry.

projects.title: Unit Converter App
projects.description: A simple and easy-to-use unit converter app developed using Flutter. Supports various unit conversions.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: A Todo app developed with Flutter to help manage tasks efficiently. Features task creation, editing, and deletion.

projects.title: Login Screen
projects.description: A modern and secure login screen built with Flutter, including validation and user authentication.

projects.title: Calculator App
projects.description: A fully functional calculator app developed using Flutter, capable of performing basic arithmetic operations.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A weather app that provides current weather information and forecasts. Built using Flutter and powered by a weather API.

projects.title: AeroTravel Login
projects.description: A stylish and user-friendly travel flight booking login or home page developed with Flutter.
